comments.body: You can just use `noarch: python` here in future.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@    - markdown-it = markdown_it.cli.parse:main
    - markdown-it-bench = markdown_it.cli.benchmark:main
  noarch: "python"
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv "

comments.body: For future reference, only `script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"` is enough here..

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +16,20 @@    - markdown-it-bench = markdown_it.cli.benchmark:main
  noarch: "python"
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv "

requirements:
